titleStmt.title: The testament of Cresseid, compylit be M. Robert Henrysone, sculemaister in Dunsermeling
titleStmt.author: Henryson, Robert, 1430?-1506?

notesStmt.note: Also printed anonymously among Chaucer's works in STC 5068 and subsequent editions.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
